abstract.para: gnome-packagekit is a suite of tools for interation with the GNOME desktop.

legalnotice.para: To report a bug or make a suggestion regarding the gnome-packagekit application or this manual, follow the directions in the gnome-packagekit Contact Page.

section.title: Introduktion
section.para: The gnome-packagekit is a suite of tools for the GNOME desktop

section.title: Användning
section.para: gnome-packagekit is usually started in GNOME startup, but you can manually start gnome-packagekit by doing:

section.title: Om
section.para:
gnome-packagekit was written by Richard Hughes richard@hughsie.com. To find more information about gnome-packagekit, please visit the
gnome-packagekit web page.

To report a bug or make a suggestion regarding this application or this manual, follow the directions at the
gnome-packagekit Bug Page.
